TITLE: Microf Data Breach Claims Investigated by Lynch Carpenter
SUMMARY:
PITTSBURGH, Dec. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Microf LLC (“Microf”), a company offering finance options for HVAC systems,1 recently announced a cybersecurity incident, which impacted the personal information of an unknown number of individuals. Lynch Carpenter, LLP is investigating claims against Microf related to this data breach. For an attorney to review your case, visit our site HERE.
